Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.25818457] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus 25923(MIC=8.6 mg/L), Staphylococcus aureus 29213(MIC=4.3 mg/L), Staphylococcus epidermidis 12228(MIC=2.2 mg/L), Enterococcus faecalis 29212(MIC=1.1 mg/L), Bacillus subtilis 11060(MIC=2.2 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli 078(MIC=2.2 mg/L), Escherichia coli K88(MIC=4.3 mg/L), Escherichia coli ER2566(MIC=2.2 mg/L), Escherichia coli 44102(MIC=8.6 mg/L), Escherichia coli 1515(MIC=2.2 mg/L), Escherichia coli 25922(MIC=2.2 mg/L), Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4.3 mg/L), Salmonella typhimurium 7731(MIC=0.5 mg/L), Salmonella typhimurium 1402(MIC=8.6 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 21625(MIC=8.6 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 21630(MIC=0.5 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 10419(MIC=4.3 mg/L), Pseudomonas aeruginosa 27853(MIC=8.6 mg/L), Salmonella pullorum 7913(MIC=8.6 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.25818457] 0% hemolysis at 9.2 mg/L , 1% hemolysis at 18.4 mg/L , 4% hemolysis at 36.8mg/L  , 5% hemolysis at 73.6 mg/L , 10% hemolysis at 147.1 mg/L , 13% hemolysis at 294.3 mg/L against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.25818457] The cell viability of PR-FO is 93%, 89%, 84%, 79%, 74%, 69%, 67%, 64% and 62% at peptide concentrations of 1.1, 2.3, 4.6, 9.2, 18.4, 36.8, 73.6, 147.1 and 294.3 Î¼g/ml.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Characterization of cell selectivity, physiological stability and endotoxin neutralization capabilities of a-helix-based peptide amphiphiles
Literature.Author: Zhi Ma, Dandan Wei, Ping Yan, Xin Zhu, Anshan Shan , Zhongpeng Bi
